title: Shens Vorpal Blade is Iconic
body:
The ability is one of the 3 major iconic things about shen (besides Stand united and Shadow dash.)

I mean, come on Riot the ability is so iconic it is even being used in Yellow jacket Shens load art.

Please dont remove the ability from Shen.

Edit: Also Yellow jacket Shen is my favourite skin, please dont change it either.

replies.body: they have to change it man
